subject: Re: Simsonn Order #SSN3209 confirmed
description_text:
Yes, please send out the three-piece. Sent from my iPhone On Nov 6, 2025, at 11:46 PM, SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> wrote: ﻿
 
 
 
 
 
 


 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 SIMSONN
 
 

 
 

 
 
 

 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Hello, we are unable to ship from China to Alaska. The Vam Pro 2-piece set is currently out of stock in our US warehouse. We can offer you an upgrade to the 3-piece set for $39 and ship it from our US warehouse. Would you like to proceed? 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 If you have any questions, reply to this email or contact us at service@simsonn.com

conversations.body_text: Hi Northpoleatv,      Okay, thank you for your prompt reply. We've already shipped your order. Please click the link to complete payment.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference-2
